Package co.cookies.sdk

Class SDKUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cookies.sdk.SDKUtil
  • @ThreadSafe
public final class SDKUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static utilities used internally by the Cookies SDK.

      • protect

        public static <T,​E extends java.lang.Throwable> T protect​(@Nonnull
                                                                java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Throwable,​java.lang.RuntimeException> rethrow,
                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                ThrowingCallable<T,​E> callable)
        "Protect" the supplied method by wrapping checked exceptions with a user-supplied RuntimeException.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Return type from the inner callable.
        E - Checked exception type we are intending to wrap.
        Parameters:
        rethrow - Function which re-throws the supplied throwable with the appropriate custom exception. The re-thrower is only expected to construct the exception, not actually throw it.
        callable - Callable which should be wrapped in checked exception protection.
        Returns:
        Return value from the callable.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If SDKUtil is thrown by the inner callable.

      • block

        public static <R extends com.google.protobuf.Message,​T> T block​(@Nonnull
                                                                      SyncRPC<R> operation,
                                                                      @Nonnull
                                                                      org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                                                      @Nonnull
                                                                      io.grpc.MethodDescriptor<R,​? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> descriptor,
                                                                      @Nonnull
                                                                      java.util.function.Function<AsyncRPC<R>,​com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T>> method)
                                                               throws CookiesSDKException
        Synchronously execute the provided dispatch-able function, converting the wrapped RPC to an async operation as we go, and then, after waiting for a maximum of the operation's timeout, returning directly any resulting value (expected to be of type SDKUtil), and throwing directly any exception that might arise.

        Should any exception arise during processing of the operation, it will propagate out to invoking code and be raised directly.

        Type Parameters:
        R - Return type expected from the operation.
        Parameters:
        operation - Operation which we need to execute synchronously.
        logger - Service logger, in case things go haywire. Receives all exceptions.
        descriptor - gRPC descriptor for the method we are executing.
        method - Callable API method, but in async form.
        Returns:
        Return value from the operation, after waiting up to the timeout period.
        Throws:
        CookiesSDKException - If any error is thrown, with the inner error assigned as the cause.

      • wrap

        public static <R> com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<R> wrap​(@Nonnull
                                                                             com.google.api.core.ApiFuture<R> apiFuture)
        Wrap a future value represented by an API future object in a regular Guava ListenableFuture which holds a value of the same type.
        Type Parameters:
        R - Wrapped future value intended to be produced by the operation.
        Parameters:
        apiFuture - API future which we should adapt into a regular listenable future.
        Returns:
        Listenable future, adapted to forward from the provided API future.

      • applyStream

        public static <R extends com.google.protobuf.Message,​T> com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<java.util.stream.Stream<T>> applyStream​(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                                                         org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                                                                                                                                         @Nonnull
                                                                                                                                                         AsyncRPC<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> operation,
                                                                                                                                                         @Nonnull
                                                                                                                                                         com.google.api.gax.rpc.ServerStream<R> stream,
                                                                                                                                                         @Nonnull
                                                                                                                                                         io.grpc.MethodDescriptor<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message,​R> descriptor,
                                                                                                                                                         @Nonnull
                                                                                                                                                         java.util.function.Function<R,​java.util.stream.Stream<T>> transformer,
                                                                                                                                                         @Nonnull
                                                                                                                                                         com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListeningScheduledExecutorService executor)
        Provided an RPC operation which is expected to produce a server-side stream of responses, wire up a transformer which can convert each response into the final return value, and then setup a stream of such final responses.

        Errors propagate via CookiesRPCException descendents, in particular RPCExecutionException. Any timeout specified on the RPC, default or otherwise, is enforced, resulting in a RPCTimeoutException if violated.

        The provided transformer is expected to produce a stream as a result, which is provided to invoking code in a ListenableFuture. The future will not execute the streaming operation until a response is listener is attached.

        Type Parameters:
        R - Streaming Message response type expected from the server.
        T - Final method result type (usually also a Message), of which a Stream is produced by the provided transformer.
        Parameters:
        logger - Main error logger to report runtime exceptions to.
        operation - RPC operation, with a request, timeout, and any call context that should be applied.
        stream - Stream of responses from the server, issued as a result of our async request.
        descriptor - gRPC method descriptor -- mostly used for error logging.
        transformer - Method transformer, which turns a response into a final facade result.
        executor - Background executor where we should prime and return the stream. Returns when the first item is yielded from the response.
        Returns:
        Future which resolves to a Stream of type SDKUtil.

      • applyAsync

        public static <R extends com.google.protobuf.Message,​T> com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T> applyAsync​(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                               org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                                                                                                               @Nonnull
                                                                                                                               AsyncRPC<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> operation,
                                                                                                                               @Nonnull
                                                                                                                               com.google.api.core.ApiFuture<R> future,
                                                                                                                               @Nonnull
                                                                                                                               io.grpc.MethodDescriptor<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message,​R> descriptor,
                                                                                                                               @Nonnull
                                                                                                                               java.util.function.Function<R,​T> transformer,
                                                                                                                               @Nonnull
                                                                                                                               com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListeningScheduledExecutorService executor)
        Wrap a future value represented by an API future object in a regular Guava ListenableFuture, and, should the operation succeed and produce a response of type SDKUtil, pass it through a transformer function which converts the response value to type SDKUtil, the final return value of the method.
        Type Parameters:
        R - Return type from the API operation.
        T - Return type from the API facade.
        Parameters:
        logger - Service logger, in case anything goes wrong.
        operation - RPC operation which we are fulfilling.
        future - API operation which intends to produce a result of type SDKUtil.
        transformer - Transformer function which is capable of transforming between types SDKUtil and SDKUtil, the final return type for the function.
        executor - Background executor to use when running the transform method.
        Returns:
        Listenable future which wraps and transforms the provided future.
